author: IGN
description:
Wishlist The Abbess Garden now on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3411970/The_Abbess_Garden/

The Abbess Garden is a cozy and historical gardening game set in 17th-century France. Play as Agnes, a young peasant who is tasked to grow plants, find and identify new ones, and decorate the garden. Help uncover a spy plot, assist others in the local community, and find a lover.

#IGN
title: The Abbess Garden - Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 may have been the best-selling game of November, but Battlefield 6 is on track to win the year. The latest sales data from Circana is positioning Battlefield to top Call of Duty for the first time in the two franchises' rivalry. In other news, Terminator: Survivors has been delayed indefinitely. The sci-fi survival game was announced a couple of years ago, and we haven't really seen much from it. And in related news, James Cameron is returning to the Terminator franchise once he's done with the upcoming Avatar: Fire and Ash. Cameron also stated that it's time for new characters in the series, so don't expect mainstay Arnold Schwarzenegger to return.

#IGN #gaming
title: Battlefield Is On Track To Outsell Call of Duty For The First Time Ever - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Watch the trailer for Dracula, an upcoming movie starring Caleb Landry Jones, Christoph Waltz, Zoë Bleu, Guillaume de Tonquedec, Matilda de Angelis, Ewens Abid, and Raphael Luce.

When a 15th-century prince (Caleb Landry Jones) witnesses the brutal murder of his wife (Zoë Bleu), he renounces God and damns heaven itself. Cursed with eternal life, he is reborn as Dracula, an immortal warlord who defies fate in a blood-soaked crusade to wrench his lost love back from death, no matter the cost. On the verge of reuniting, Dracula is hunted by a relentless priest (Christoph Waltz), sworn to end his immortal reign.

Mark Canton, Dorothy Canton, Ryan Winterstern and Philippe Corrot serve as executive producers on Dracula. It is written, directed & produced by Luc Besson.

Dracula opens in theaters nationwide on February 6, 2026.

#IGN
title: Dracula - Official Trailer (2026) Christoph Waltz, Zoë Bleu

author: IGN
description:
After a catastrophic military disaster, the dead don’t just rise - they hunt. The military insists they are harmless and slow-moving, offering hope to grieving families. But when Ava (Daisy Ridley) enters a quarantine zone searching for her missing husband, she uncovers the horrifying truth: the undead are growing more violent, more relentless, and more dangerous with every passing hour.

Written and directed by Zak Hilditch, We Bury The Dead opens in theaters on January 2, 2026.
title: We Bury The Dead: Exclusive Clip (2026) Daisy Ridley

title: Canyons: 15 Minutes of Alpha Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Destiny 2: Renegades expansion reviewed on PC and Xbox, also available on PlayStation.

To my surprise, Destiny 2: Renegades works a lot better than I thought a Star Wars crossover would, offering a light-hearted and often corny story, an extraction-inspired mode with some neat ideas, and an endgame dungeon that lives up to Destiny’s strong track record. The main thing holding it back is that there just isn’t much to it, with three maps you’ll see a whole lot of while running Lawless Frontier, a short story that’s been padded out by filler, and a dungeon that’s far faster to complete than usual. Some new weapons, especially the Praxic Blade lightsabers, vehicles like the Behemoth walkers, and Renegade abilities that let you call in airstrikes on your adversaries, go a long way to mix up this overly familiar sandbox. It’s definitely a breath of fresh air for Destiny 2 overall, it’s just a bit of a shallow breath.
title: Destiny 2: Renegades Review

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl trailer for the FPS game to see what to expect with the Stories Untold content update, which features a new storyline, 8 quests, 7 locations to explore, 6 characters with their own backgrounds and stories, a unique weapon, and a chance to develop and sustain a new hub in the Burnt Forest shaped by your decisions. Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl's Stories Untold content update is available now on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5).

For months now, the Zone’s radio has become no less dangerous than any of its manifestations. Tune in too long, hesitate for a second — and you may never come back the same. Only a small group risking everything to learn more about the Transmission. And now they stand just a few steps away from the answers, whatever their price may be.

#IGN #STALKER2 #FPS
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official 'Stories Untold' Content Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Avatar: Fire and Ash is the third installment in the epic sci-fi franchise that James Cameron began work on in 2005, and some of the cast have been along for that entire ride. We asked Cameron, Sigourney Weaver, Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Stephen Lang how their experiences of making the films has evolved, how Oona Chaplin's Varang fits into the Avatar family, and how James Cameron's directing style has changed over the years, according to Weaver and Saldaña.

#IGN
title: "He's Much More Fun" | How James Cameron Changed Between Aliens and Avatar

author: IGN
description:
This review contains spoilers for Fallout Season 2’s premiere episode, “The Innovator”, which is available to stream now on Prime Video. 

The first episode of Fallout’s second season promises that a great, twisty journey lies ahead, headlined by the ever-fantastic Ella Purnell and Walton Goggins, and lent some extra grease by the suave-yet-slimy Robert House, given brilliant new life by Justin Theroux. But while the gears are aligned by the time credits roll, the genuine excitement hasn’t quite started yet. Much of the opening half-hour feels like flicking through your quest log and rifling through your inventory to remind yourself of where you were, and the seemingly inconsequential vault-based storylines threaten to get lost among better ideas. But even with those problems, this is a good hour of television that signals even better things to come. 

#IGN #FalloutTVSeries #Fallout
title: Fallout Season 2 Premiere Review

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Another Eden x Chrono Cross Symphony 'Complex Dream' trailer for this crossover as classic characters from the 1999 RPG, Chrono Cross, join the world of Another Eden. The crossover has been extended from December 2026 to December 8, 2031. In February 2026, new sub-quests and a new playable character, Glenn, will be added. Existing playable characters from Chrono Cross ( Serge, Kid, Harle, and Starky) will be available for Stellar Awakening, unlocking new abilities and a higher level cap. Another Eden is available now on PC via Steam, iOS, and Android.

In an alternate timeline where Another Eden protagonist Aldo fails to defeat the Beast King, beloved Chrono Cross characters Serge, Kid, Harle, and Starky join the team as playable party members and kick off a new storyline.
title: Complex Dream - Official Another Eden x Chrono Cross Symphony Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Based on true events, this terrifying survival thriller follows a rookie park ranger thrust into the fight of her life when Glacier National Park becomes the scene of deadly grizzly attacks. As panic spreads and communication breaks down, she must lead a group of frightened strangers through the darkness, confronting both the untamed wilderness and her own fears. What begins as a quiet summer evening turns into a night of chaos that changes the nation’s understanding of wildlife forever.

#IGN #Movies
title: Grizzly Night - Official Trailer (2026)
